description.lang: The Telguard FlexHub Z-Wave Controller enhances HomeControl Flex system control for Z-Wave based products such as lights, locks and thermostats. It is powered by a standard wall adapter and connects to the LAN (Local Area Network) via wired Ethernet. It serves as a Wi-Fi access point for other devices and incorporates WPS (Wi-Fi Protected Set-up) for quick and secure connecting. The FlexHub is a simple way to add home automation to any security panel and works with all Telguard alarm communicators and is easy to support via Telguards dealer portal. Learn more at Telguard.com.
